title: Legacy Play
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: Legacy Play
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones weighs in on “Father Time” catching up with both Buccaneers QB Tom Brady and Green Bay QB Aaron Rodgers, but in different ways (0:30). Plus, the unfortunate situation that the Lakers have found themselves in (16:17), an IYHH including the K-Pop band BTS reporting for military service in South Korea (34:02), and your voicemails from giving the proper amount of respect to security (47:15)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @davelevinthal shares how America’s gerontocracy is weakening democracy: https://bit.ly/3gG5bWI
  2.  @mjgault shares that the Netherlands has deployed NATOs first killer robot ground vehicles: https://bit.ly/3FaTwJT
  3. @chloetaylor141 shares how South Korea could lose billions from making K-pop superstars BTS do military service:  https://bit.ly/3sq9Y1m
